table: create table IF NOT EXISTS site_detail(barcode_prefix,label,pc_desc, pc_ext_id,pc_id, value)
create table IF NOT EXISTS blocks(block_id,label,pc_id)
create table IF NOT EXISTS building(block_id,building_id,label)
create table IF NOT EXISTS floor(building_id, floor_id, floor_img, label)
create table IF NOT EXISTS location(floor_id,label,location_id)
create table IF NOT EXISTS department(dept_desc,dept_ext_id,dept_id)
create table IF NOT EXISTS device_group(label,rate_of_dprctn,grp_id)
create table IF NOT EXISTS device_sub_group(grp_id,label, subgrp_class, subgrp_id)
create table IF NOT EXISTS ownership(id,label,ownership,value)
create table IF NOT EXISTS equip_status(id,label,status_name,value)
create table IF NOT EXISTS technology_status(label,value)
create table IF NOT EXISTS warranty(id,status,warranty)
